identity.philosophy: Clinical Precision. Trust over Trend. Function over Fluff.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Medical Sterility with Fintech Precision.
Content is King: Data must be scannable instantly.
Zoom In: Focus on the task at hand (Visit, Order, Map).
Negative Space: Reduce cognitive load for tired field reps.

rules: NO pure white text on pure black background. Use off-white (#f8fafc) on Slate-900.
Primary color (Teal) is for ACTIONS only (Buttons, Links, Active States).
Backgrounds should be mostly White or Slate-50.
Gradients are FORBIDDEN except for subtle active states (e.g., bg-gradient-to-r from-teal-50 to-transparent).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for normal text. Use Slate-600+ on white.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-primary) on all interactive elements.
accessibility.touch_targets: Minimum 44x44px for all mobile touch targets.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic 'SaaS Blue' (#3b82f6). Use the defined Teal palette.
DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
DO NOT center text by default. Left-align for readability.
Mobile First: Design for the Rep in the field first, then the Admin in the office.
Offline Mode: UI must clearly indicate sync status (Green = Synced, Amber = Pending).
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-trust medical dashboard. Precision is key. Do not make it look like a toy. Use the provided Teal color palette strictly. Implement the 'Control Room' layout for Admins and 'Feed' layout for Reps. Ensure all forms are clean, spacious, and validated. Use the provided image URLs for placeholders.
